mapper.select: select su.*, sr.role_id, sr.role_name, sr.remark, sr.REVISION from sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id left join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id

select su.*, sr.role_id, sr.role_name, sr.remark, sr.REVISION from sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id left join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id
and `number` = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
